title: Breaking Murphy's Law: How Optimists Get What They Want
description:
Breaking Murphy's Law: How Optimists Get What They Want from Life - and Pessimists Can Too by Suzanne C. Segerstrom

Overview: Pollyannas take heart, pessimists take note: Recent studies on achievement and well-being show that optimistic behavior contributes to better physical health, greater resilience in the face of lifeâ€™s twists and turns, and more satisfying relationships. As psychologists Suzanne Segerstrom reveals, optimists lay groundwork for the success they envision. While the rest of us worry whether our goals are attainable, those who practice optimism try to achieve theirs. Breaking Murphyâ€™s Law shows you simple ways to develop the skills that natural-born optimists use to get what they want from life. Dr. Segerstrom helps you break free from the inertia of cynicism and self-doubt and encourages you to engage the world around you. â€œDoing optimismâ€--by getting involved, working hard, and enjoying your achievements--establishes a positive feedback loop thatâ€™s both personally transformative and self-perpetuating
